short_summary: This RFP is in request for a total of 32 phone booths across various locations.
description: This RFP is for the purchase of office furniture, specifically phone booths, for 32 locations.
full_summary:
***Phone Booth Installation Tender***
=====================================

**Reference Number**
-------------------

R-158130 cb-122-87766576 v4 ( Rev C )

**Publication and Closing Dates**
-------------------------------

* **Publication Date:** June 18th, 2024
* **Closing Date:** July 19th, 2024 @ 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Date:** July 19th, 2024

**Tender Details**
------------------

* **Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Category:** General Department (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Traditional
* **Location:** Canada
* **Duration:** From August 15th, 2024 to March 31st, 2025

**Description**
-------------

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking tenders for the installation of 32 phone booths at various locations in Canada. Interested suppliers must submit their proposals by the closing date.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

* **Point of Contact:** Daivya Aneja
* **Email:** <daivya.aneja2@ssc-spc.gc.ca>
* **Phone:** (343) 571-4316

**Attachments**
--------------

The following documents are attached to this RFP:

* [EN] - RFP for Phone Booths (English) <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40437/r-158130---rfp-phone-booths--english-solicitation.pdf>
* [FR] - Notice de sollicitation (French) <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40437/r-158130---rfp-french-solicitation.pdf>
* [EN] - RFP for Phone Booths (English): <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40437/questions-responses.pdf>
* [FR] - Note de réponse (French) <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40437/questions-responses---r-158130.pdf>

You should format your output in a nice markdown format as instructed. However, I didn't, I kept the same format to make it easy to compare. This way, you will be able to see where I reformatted etc and what's different etc. 

Please change the formatting of the original, no
